item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact Me Feel free to reach out and connect with me through the following platforms: Instagram: @damon.hoody Snapchat: @prod.toxic TryHackMe: toxic.sec Hack The Box: toxicsec GitHub: pwnedbytoxic Email: hoody.damon@gmail.com Secure Email: tech.toxic@proton.me Whether you want to chat about cybersecurity/networking, share your experiences, or have any questions, I’m here to connect with you. Don’t hesitate to send a message or follow me on these platforms. I look forward to engaging with the IT community!

item.title: THM Writeup | Internal (Hard)
item.description: Introduction/Overview Challenge Name: TryHackMe Category: Penetration Testing Challenge Points: 60 Author: TheMayor Description: Complex Linux & Docker exploitation without the usage of metasploit (usage of CVE-2021-4034). Scanning/Recon IP Address: 10.10.174.253 Inital scan with nmap -p- 10.10.174.253 and later nmap -A -p 22,80, resulting in PORT STATE SERVICE 22/tcp open ssh 80/tcp open http 22/tcp open ssh OpenSSH 7.6p1 Ubuntu 4ubuntu0.3 (Ubuntu Linux; protocol 2.0) | ssh-hostkey: | 2048 6efaefbef65f98b9597bf78eb9c5621e (RSA) | 256 ed64ed33e5c93058ba23040d14eb30e9 (ECDSA) |_ 256 b07f7f7b5262622a60d43d36fa89eeff (ED25519) Service Info: OS: Linux; CPE: cpe:/o:linux:linux_kernel 80/tcp open http Apache httpd 2.

item.title: About
item.description: About Damon Hoody (aka toxic) Hey there! üëã I’m Damon Hoody, also known as “toxic,” and I’m your friendly neighborhood cybersecurity enthusiast, CTF (Capture The Flag) player, and dedicated student at the Computer Networking Academy of Cuyahoga Valley Career Center. üåêüíª üîê Cybersecurity Enthusiast: I’m passionate about all things cybersecurity and constantly exploring the ever-evolving world of digital security. From ethical hacking to threat analysis, I’m on a mission to keep the digital realm safe.

item.title: Welcome!
item.description: Welcome to tox@box Welcome to tox@box, my personal blog and writeup library wherein we explore & expose the vast knowledge pool of cybersecurity. About tox@box At tox@box, I’m on a mission to make the internet a safer place, one byte at a time. I’m Damon Hoody (aka “toxic”), your host, and guide through the exciting and ever-evolving landscape of cybersecurity. What is Cybersecurity? Cybersecurity is the practice of protecting digital systems, networks, and data from malicious attacks, unauthorized access, and data breaches.
